burnTokens(address,uint256,uint256).details: Reduces tokens from a user's stake.

params._user: Address of the user whose tokens will be burned.

claimRewards(uint256).details: Claims rewards for a specific stake after a period. Rewards can be claimed immediately, and locked tokens can be withdrawn after the staking period.

params.stakeIndex: Index of the stake in the stakes array.

constructor.details: Constructor sets the token address and initializes staking limits and penalties.

params._token: Address of the ERC20 token used for staking.

getRecentStakeIndex().details: Get the recent stake index of a user.

getStake(uint256).details: Get the stake of a user.

getStakeCount().details: Get the stake count of a user.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

stakeTokens(uint256,uint256).details: Stakes tokens for a specified period.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
